description: Addresses the fast fashion industry's environmental impact and greenwashing by empowering consumers to make informed sustainable fashion choices. Uses AI to scan garments and provide transparency through Eco-Scores (1-10 sustainability ratings) and material analysis. Helps users find eco-friendly stores, promotes circular economy in fashion, and combats textile waste. Targets UN SDG 12 (Responsible Consumption and Production) and SDG 13 (Climate Action).
